text: Brian Holland (born February 15, 1941) is an American songwriter and record producer. He was best known as a member of Holland–Dozier–Holland. He also wrote many popular songs that were sung by Martha and the Vandellas, The Supremes, The Four Tops, and The Isley Brothers. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American record producers Category:American songwriters Category:Musicians from Detroit Category:Writers from Detroit
title: Brian Holland
